headline: Women’s  Basketball  Lost an Ally
abstract: His skills proved that basketball is a mental game. Plus, he was a fan.
lead_paragraph: In 2013 my college team, the California Golden Bears, made it to the final four of the national championship. One day in the locker room our coach, Lindsay Gottlieb, told us there was a surprise. She projected a grainy cellphone video of a personal message from Kobe Bryant wishing us luck. We lost to Louisville in the semifinal, but Kobe’s belief in us stuck.
